name: Moue Milkshakes
description:
Moue (/mu/)
 a little grimace : pout
---
Grimace Shakes are/were the big thing. So I thought "why the hell not.", And now I can proudly present Moue Milkshakes!
Using state-of-the-art methods, you can now brew, *yes* brew, your milkshakes!
Using shake mix and some milk bottles (provided by Milk Lib) you can create Vanilla, Chocolate, or Strawberry shakes.
